content.question: When did you get married?
content.useTheDate: Use the date on your marriage certificate
content.facts: Later in this application, you’ll be asked to choose a reason for the breakdown of your marriage from a list of 5 options.
content.options: You won’t be shown the following options if you haven’t been married for long enough to use them.
content.separated2YearsDescription: Your {{ divorceWho }} agrees to a divorce and you’ve been separated for the past 2 years or more
content.separated5YearsDescription: You’ve been separated from your {{ divorceWho }} for the past 5 years or more
content.desertionDescription: Your {{ divorceWho }} abandoned you (left without your agreement) more than 2 years ago
content.stillCanUse: You’ll be able to select behaviour and adultery, as long as you’ve been married for more than a year.

marriageDateMonth.invalid: Enter a valid month for your marriage date

marriageDateYear.required: Enter the year for your marriage date
marriageDateYear.invalid: Enter a valid year for your marriage date

marriageDateIsFuture.invalid: Enter a marriage date that is in the past

marriageDateMoreThan100.invalid: Enter a marriage date that is less than a 100 years ago

content.question: Pryd wnaethoch briodi?
content.useTheDate: Defnyddiwch y dyddiad sydd ar eich tystysgrif priodas
content.duration: Wedi priodi am lai na 2 flynedd?
content.facts: Yn nes ymlaen yn y cais hwn, gofynnir ichi ddewis rheswm, o blith 5 opsiwn, pam y bu i’ch priodas chwalu.
content.options: Ni fydd yr opsiynau canlynol yn ymddangos os nad ydych wedi priodi ers digon o amser i’w defnyddio.
content.separated2YearsTitle: Wedi gwahanu am 2 flynedd drwy gytundeb
content.separated2YearsDescription: Mae eich{{ divorceWho }} yn cytuno i ysgaru ac rydych wedi gwahanu ers 2 flynedd neu fwy
content.separated5YearsDescription: Rydych wedi gwahanu oddi wrth eich {{ divorceWho }} ers 5 mlynedd neu fwy
content.desertionDescription: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi eich gadael (heb i chi gytuno) ers mwy na 2 flynedd
content.stillCanUse: Byddwch yn gallu dewis ymddygiad a godineb, cyhyd â’ch bod wedi priodi ers mwy na blwyddyn.
